trans-unit.source: Enumerates types of speech synthesis events.
trans-unit.target: Enumera los tipos de eventos de la síntesis de voz.

trans-unit.source: Custom speech synthesis engines define the types of events submitted to the Speech platform synthesizer infrastructure with the <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TtsEventId>.
trans-unit.target: Motores de síntesis de voz personalizado definen los tipos de eventos enviados a la infraestructura de sintetizador de voz plataforma con el <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TtsEventId>.

trans-unit.source: Specification is performed by setting the <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.SpeechEventInfo.EventId%2A> property of <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.SpeechEventInfo> instances passed to the <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.ITtsEngineSite.AddEvents%2A> member of the class implementing the <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.ITtsEngineSite> interface passed to the <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TtsEngineSsml.Speak%2A> method on a custom speech engine's implementation of <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TtsEngineSsml>.
trans-unit.target: Especificación se realiza estableciendo la <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.SpeechEventInfo.EventId%2A> propiedad de <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.SpeechEventInfo> instancias pasan a la <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.ITtsEngineSite.AddEvents%2A> miembro de la clase que implementa el <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.ITtsEngineSite> interfaz se pasa a la <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TtsEngineSsml.Speak%2A> método en la implementación del motor de voz personalizado de <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TtsEngineSsml>.

trans-unit.source: The Speech platform infrastructure indicates the type of events it is currently handling through the <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.ITtsEngineSite.EventInterest%2A> property on the <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.ITtsEngineSite> passed to the speak implementation.
trans-unit.target: La infraestructura de la plataforma de voz indica el tipo de eventos que lleva a cabo actualmente a través de la <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.ITtsEngineSite.EventInterest%2A> propiedad en el <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.ITtsEngineSite> pasan a la implementación de hablar.

trans-unit.source: The value of <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.ITtsEngineSite.EventInterest%2A> is a bitmask, where the members of <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TtsEventId> define the location of the bit corresponding to the event type.
trans-unit.target: El valor de <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.ITtsEngineSite.EventInterest%2A> es una máscara de bits, donde los miembros de <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TtsEventId> definir la ubicación del bit que corresponde al tipo de evento.

trans-unit.source: For example, WordBoundary has a value of five (5), meaning the fifth bit in the value returned by <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.ITtsEngineSite.EventInterest%2A> indicates if the site supports the event type.
trans-unit.target: Por ejemplo, WordBoundary tiene un valor de cinco (5), lo que significa que el bit en el valor devuelto por quinto <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.ITtsEngineSite.EventInterest%2A> indica si el sitio admite el tipo de evento.

trans-unit.source: The example below is part of a custom speech synthesis implementation inheriting from <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TtsEngineSsml>, and using the use of <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TextFragment>, <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.SpeechEventInfo>, <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.FragmentState>, and <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TtsEventId>
trans-unit.target: En el ejemplo siguiente forma parte de una implementación de síntesis de voz personalizados heredando de <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TtsEngineSsml>y el uso de la utilización de <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TextFragment>, <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.SpeechEventInfo>, <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.FragmentState>, y <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TtsEventId>

trans-unit.source: The implementation of <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TtsEngineSsml.Speak%2A>
trans-unit.target: La implementación de <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TtsEngineSsml.Speak%2A>

trans-unit.source: Receives an array of <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TextFragment> instances and creates a new array of <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TextFragment> instances to be passed to the `Speak` method on an underlying synthesis engine.
trans-unit.target: Recibe una matriz de <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TextFragment> instancias y crea una nueva matriz de <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TextFragment> instancias que se pasan a la `Speak` método en un motor de síntesis subyacente.

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TtsEngineAction> enumeration value by found from the <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.FragmentState.Action%2A> property on the <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.FragmentState.Action%2A> returned by the <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TextFragment.State%2A> property of each <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TextFragment.State%2A> instance is <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TtsEngineAction>, the implementation
trans-unit.target: Si el <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TtsEngineAction> por obtener valor de enumeración de la <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.FragmentState.Action%2A> propiedad en el <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.FragmentState.Action%2A> devuelto por la <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TextFragment.State%2A> propiedad de cada <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TextFragment.State%2A> instancia es <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TtsEngineAction>, la implementación

trans-unit.source: Translates Americanism to Britishisms in the text to be spoken.
trans-unit.target: Traduce Americanism a Britishisms en el texto que se va a hablar.

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.ITtsEngineSite.EventInterest%2A> property on the <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.ITtsEngineSite.EventInterest%2A> interfaces provided to the implementation support the WordBoundary event type, a <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.SpeechEventInfo> instance is used to create an event to drive a synthesizer progress meter is created.
trans-unit.target: Si el <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.ITtsEngineSite.EventInterest%2A> propiedad en el <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.ITtsEngineSite.EventInterest%2A> interfaces proporcionadas para la implementación admiten el tipo de evento WordBoundary, un <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.SpeechEventInfo> instancia se utiliza para crear un evento que se crea un indicador de progreso de sintetizador de unidad.

trans-unit.source: A speech rendering engine is then called with the modified <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TextFragment> array.
trans-unit.target: A continuación, se llama a un motor de representación de voz con modificados <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TextFragment> matriz.

trans-unit.source: Identifies events generated when a speech synthesize engine completes an audio level change while speaking.
trans-unit.target: Identifica los eventos generados cuando un motor de síntesis de voz completa un cambio de nivel de sonido mientras habla.

trans-unit.source: Identifies events generated when a speech synthesize engine encounters a bookmark while speaking.
trans-unit.target: Identifica los eventos generados cuando un motor de síntesis de voz encuentra un marcador mientras habla.

trans-unit.source: Identifies events generated when a speech synthesize engine encounters the end of its input stream while speaking.
trans-unit.target: Identifica los eventos generados cuando un motor de síntesis de voz encuentra el final de su flujo de entrada mientras habla.

trans-unit.source: Identifies events generated when a speech synthesize engine completes a phoneme while speaking.
trans-unit.target: Identifica los eventos generados cuando un motor de síntesis de voz completa un fonema mientras habla.

trans-unit.source: Identifies events generated when a speech synthesize engine completes a sentence while speaking.
trans-unit.target: Identifica los eventos generados cuando un motor de síntesis de voz completa una frase mientras habla.

trans-unit.source: Identifies events generated when a speech synthesize engine a begins speaking a stream.
trans-unit.target: Identifica los eventos generados cuando un motor de síntesis de voz comienza a pronunciar un flujo.

trans-unit.source: Identifies events generated when a speech synthesize engine completes a viseme while speaking.
trans-unit.target: Identifica los eventos generados cuando un motor de síntesis de voz completa un visema mientras habla.

trans-unit.source: Identifies events generated when a speech synthesize engine encounters a change of Voice while speaking.
trans-unit.target: Identifica los eventos generados cuando un motor de síntesis de voz encuentra un cambio de voz mientras habla.

trans-unit.source: Identifies events generated when a speech synthesize engine completes a word while speaking.
trans-unit.target: Identifica los eventos generados cuando un motor de síntesis de voz completa una palabra mientras habla.
